scripts.docker:nursery:reset: cd docker && docker-compose -f docker-compose.nursery.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.nursery.yml pull && docker-compose -f docker-compose.nursery.yml up -d
scripts.docker:nursery:db: cd docker && docker-compose -f docker-compose.nursery.yml up -d postgres redis
scripts.docker:nursery:db:stop: cd docker && docker-compose -f docker-compose.nursery.yml stop postgres redis
scripts.docker:nursery:db:connect: docker exec -it cruxgarden-nursery-postgres psql -U cruxgarden -d cruxgarden
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
